title: Simple Deep Learning Module named GDnet
description: An educational recreation of top deep learning libraries like TensorFlow and PyTorch, built from scratch without high-level optimizations.

title: Sastranet
description: An all-in-one mobile platform made by the Sastranet team at SASTRA University to help students with everything from academics to life on campus.

title: Mindful
description: A web extension that converts your browser into a mindfulness tool and helps you stay focused on the task at hand.

title: IDE made in Java simple and clean.
description: A simple IDE that has AI and running on device using Ollama made in Java

title: Graph Visualization
description: A web-based shortest-path visualizer using a custom Dijkstra-like algorithm, implemented with Python and Django, and hosted on Render.com.
